EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage depot.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron plates (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]).
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper plates (status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warnings: ["no ingredients to smelt"]; fuel inventory updated with coal [coal: 2] and energy at 1600).

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science pack(s) for research (automation), status: NO_POWER, electrical id updated to 2928.
- Connected small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5) and (10.5, 7.5) forming an electricity network.
- Electricity provided via ElectricityGroup with id=2928.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for electricity generation (status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]); neighbours include pipes at positions (3.5, 23.5), (4.5, 23.5), and (2.5, 24.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for steam production (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]); its fluid_box contains approximately 200 units of water at 15° with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); neighbours include pipes at positions (-7.5, 25.5) and (-7.5, 24.5); operating on fluid_system updated to [9396].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction (status: WORKING); connection point at (-9.5, 23.5) with neighbours at positions (-8.5, 23.5), (-8.5, 22.5), and (-9.5, 23.5); part of fluid_system [9396].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9396 at position(-6.5, 20.5) (status: WORKING)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9397 at position(-2.5, 20.5) (status: EMPTY)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9398 at position(-0.5, 21.5) (status: EMPTY)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9403 at position(-3.5, 23.5) (status: EMPTY)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9402 at position(-7.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9407 at position(3.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9406 at position(2.5, 24.5) (status: EMPTY)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9409 at position(-0.5, 28.5) (status: EMPTY)
- Electricity connectivity linked via ElectricityGroup with id=2928.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────
• Repeated Fluid Connection Failures:
  - Multiple attempts using PipeGroup fluid_system IDs [9052, 9095, 9138, 9181, 9224, 9267, 9310, 9353] to supply water to the steam engine all resulted in no working PipeGroup being found.
  - Tip: Verify and target the active PipeGroup fluid_system (e.g., fluid_system=9396 as per the updated pipeline configuration) before attempting connections.

• Ineffective Stabilization Delays:
  - Consistent 10-second wait periods following unsuccessful connection attempts have not improved the pipeline network’s stabilization.
  - Tip: Confirm proper alignment and connectivity of the pipeline before applying delays to avoid redundant idle time.

• Persistent Steam Engine Connection Issue:
  - Despite multiple connection attempts, the steam engine remains in a NOT_CONNECTED state with warnings about lacking power network integration and water input.
  - Tip: Re-assess the steam engine’s connection points and ensure they are aligned with an active PipeGroup for effective water supply.
